places.name: Rectory
places.description: The rector is the highest authority and legal representative of the institution. Directs, coordinates and controls the activities of all the dependencies of the university.

places.name: General Secretariat
places.description: The purpose of the General Secretariat is to support the Rectory in the representation, coordination and follow-up of administrative, academic and technical matters delegated to it, providing a service and quality management that contributes to the generation of the necessary conditions for performance of the functions of our House of Studies.

places.name: General Directorate of Undergraduate Teaching
places.description: Integrated by the following departments: Curricular Development, Control and Teaching Follow-up, Educational Evaluation, Educational Innovation, Training and Academic Update.

places.name: General Directorate of University Infrastructure
places.description: Integrated by the following departments: Department of Constructions, Department of Maintenance, Department of General Services, Department of Graphic Processes, Department of Transportation, Department of Surveillance.

places.name: General Directorate of Planning and Development
places.description: It is in charge of carrying out all the studies and research necessary for the formulation and updating of short, medium and long-term plans for the University, and for coordinating all the institutional planning processes.

places.name: General Directorate of Finance
places.description: It is made up of the departments of: savings banks, purchases, accounting, budgetary control, control of movable and immovable property and budget and financial administration

places.name: General Directorate of Research and Postgraduate
places.description: Coordinates the research activities (from the design and dissemination of the call to present projects to be financed to the collaboration and promotion of spaces for the dissemination of research results) and postgraduate (from the design, review and curricular evaluation of the studies of postgraduate, until its accreditation by national and international organizations). It is also responsible for the management of student and teacher mobility processes and the promotion of intellectual property protection.

places.name: Directorate General of Dissemination and Liaison
places.description: Coordinates, supports and implements actions that address different aspects of the dissemination, linkage and extension of culture through the administrative departments of Academic Extension, Cultural Diffusion, Linking, Radio and University TV and Editorial.

places.name: University Gallery
places.description: Project focused on the plastic arts in general. Renowned artists present their works of sculpture, painting, graphics, object art, photography, among others.

places.name: General Directorate of Educational Services
places.description: It offers coordinated quality services in support of students' school trajectory, allowing them to complete their training in a timely, pertinent and comprehensive manner. It includes the following departments: Support for Integral Training, Educational Credit and Scholarships, Sports, Bibliographic Information and Educational Guidance.

places.name: Administrative Academic Building
places.description: Building of 11 levels among which are some departments such as cultural dissemination, academic exchange and scholarships, general affairs, among others.

places.name: School Control and Cash Registers
places.description: Windows for service to carry out any kind of academic procedure and cash registers to pay for services.

places.name: Basic Sciences Center
places.description: The Basic Sciences Center includes the following educational programs: Bachelor in Biology, Bachelor in Biotechnology, Biochemical Engineer, Eng. In Electronics, Eng. In Intelligent Computing, Eng. In Computational Systems, Statistical Industrial Engineer, Bachelor in Chemical Analysis- Biological, Bachelor of Environmental Sciences, Bachelor of Applied Mathematics and Bachelor of Information Technology.

places.name: Center for Design and Construction Sciences
places.description: The Center for Design and Construction Sciences includes the following educational programs: Architecture, Civil Engineering, Interior Design Degree, Bachelor of Fashion Design in Apparel and Textiles, Bachelor of Graphic Design, Bachelor of Industrial Design and Bachelor of Town planning.

places.name: Center of Economic and Administrative Sciences
places.description: The Center for Economic and Administrative Sciences includes the following educational programs: Public Accountant, Bachelor of Production Administration and Services, Bachelor of Financial Administration, Bachelor of Business Administration, Bachelor of International Trade, Bachelor of Economics, Bachelor of Tourism Management, Bachelor of Marketing and Bachelor of Industrial Relations

places.name: Center of Health Sciences
places.description: The Center for Health Sciences includes the following educational programs: Degree in Physical Culture and Sport, Bachelor of Nursing, Bachelor of Nutrition, Bachelor of Optometry, Bachelor of Physical Therapy, Surgeon and Stomatologist.

places.name: Center of Social Sciences and Humanities
places.description: The Center for Social Sciences and Humanities includes the following educational programs: Bachelor in Counseling Psychopedagogical, Bachelor of Political Science and Public Administration, Bachelor of Communication and Information, Bachelor of Organizational Communication, Bachelor of Law, Bachelor of Teaching French and Spanish as Foreign Languages, Bachelor of English Language Teaching, Bachelor of Philosophy, Bachelor of History, Bachelor of Psychology, Bachelor of Sociology and Bachelor of Social Work.

places.name: Department of Communication and Public Relations
places.description: Coordinates the actions and activities concerning institutional communication, which seeks to disseminate the university's values and tasks, as well as the contributions of the Institution to society, through its own and external media.

places.name: Federation of Students
places.description: Association of students in charge of representing the student community before the authorities.

places.name: University Bookstore
places.description: Sale of books to students and the general public.

places.name: La Posta products
places.description: Shop of natural products elaborated by the Center of Agricultural Sciences.

places.name: Universitienda
places.description: Promotional items store with the official image of the Universidad Autónoma Aguascalientes.

places.name: Oral Trial Chamber
places.description: The Oral Courtroom of the UAA benefits both the university community and society, as in its facilities may be trained and updated trial lawyers to apply the New Criminal Justice System.

places.name: University Radio Station
places.description: Radio station of the Universidad Autónoma de Aguascalientes. Broadcast on 94.7 FM

places.name: "Jesús F. Contreras" Vault
places.description: The Jesús F. Contreras Vault is a space that receives historical collections of figures representative of the art and culture of the Aguascalientes region. It was built with the necessary technical requirements for the conservation of documents: space conditioning, infrastructure, technological equipment such as automated air conditioning, shelving suitable for distribution and safeguarding of historical heritage.

places.name: Security Department Storehouse
places.description: Place where you can request services such as: extraordinary surveillance service, admission to the university on non-working days, entry and removal of equipment from the facilities and stay of vehicles in the parking lot.

places.name: East Guard house
places.description: Guard house of the Department of Surveillance East

places.name: Central Library
places.description: The UAA library is the most important in the state of Aguascalientes. It has a collection that exceeds 380 thousand volumes of books, as well as periodicals and electronic resources that allow the consultation of specialized databases at national and international level. It also offers services such as: Loan of specialized equipment for the blind, Loan of portable computer equipment, study cubicles, online renewal, among others.

places.name: "Dr. Pedro de Alba" Auditorium
places.description: The auditorium "Dr. Pedro de Alba " was founded on January 1, 1973 and has a capacity of 350 people. In this space conferences, workshops, film screenings, etc. are held.

places.name: West Guard house
places.description: Guard house of the Department of Surveillance East

places.name: SUAP
places.description: Address accidents and contingencies that occur in the facilities of the university campus.

places.name: Medical Teaching Unit
places.description: It offers the university community and the population in general that requires it, comprehensive health services with costs under the private environment.

places.name: "Dr. Alfonso Pérez Romo" Auditorium
places.description: Auditorium of the Center for Health Sciences, was inaugurated on June 19, 1973 and has a capacity of 100 people.

places.name: Expoforo Room
places.description: Multipurpose room of the Center for Design and Construction Sciences. In this place various types of events are held such as Seminars, Workshops, Conferences, etc.

places.name: North Library
places.description: The UAA library is the most important in the state of Aguascalientes. It has a collection that exceeds 380 thousand volumes of books, as well as periodicals and electronic resources that allow the consultation of specialized databases at national and international level. It also offers services such as: Loan of specialized equipment for the blind, Loan of portable computer equipment, study cubicles, online renewal, among others.

places.name: Maintenance
places.description: You can request maintenance service: furniture and real estate, electrical and plumbing, optical and electromechanical and electronic equipment.

places.name: Transportation
places.description: It offers the university community transport services for the realization of local trips (within the state of Aguascalientes) and foreign trips (outside the state of Aguascalientes).

places.name: Warehouse, Graphic Processes and Inventories
places.description: Warehouse and inventories of the university, The Department of Graphic Processes will only provide the service of design, edition and printing of the bibliographic material, large format printing and various articles required by the Institution.

places.name: Weather Station
places.description: It is a team that is intended to measure and record various meteorological variables in a given time and is used for the preparation of predictions from numerical models as for climate studies.

places.name: Sports Under Cover
places.description: The UAA provides the necessary elements for the practice of physical-sporting activities that positively impact on the integral development of the community.

places.name: University Gym
places.description: It offers the community a healthy place to perform physical and recreational activities. It is fully equipped with bicycles, treadmills and state-of-the-art weight machines, a wealth of exercise resources that can be used by up to 100 users at a time.

places.name: Poliforum
places.description: Inaugurated in 2016, the poliforum has been renovated, modernized, expanded and completely rehabilitated in its infrastructure, facilities and equipment for the practice of sports, the promotion of arts and culture, and community coexistence.

places.name: Veterinary Hospital
places.description: It contributes to the teaching of the students of the Veterinary Medicine career Zootecnista and to others, thanks to its facilities, equpamento and experience of the professors, has consolidated like a place where the animal health is attended, not only of the entity but of the region.

places.name: Bioterium
places.description: The bioterium is one of the spaces available to the Center for Basic Sciences to promote knowledge and comprehensive training of students. The basic function of the bioterio is to take care of the animals in the medical and alimentary aspects and its use in the laboratory, safeguarding the health of people, animals and their environment. Rats, mice, hamsters, rabbits, herds, lambs, amphibians and chickens are now reared.

places.name: "Ing. Javier Salazar Negrete" Auditorium
places.description: Auditorium of the Center of Basic Sciences, was inaugurated on June 19, 1973 and has a capacity of 286 people.

places.name: University Television Unit "Pedro Rivas Cuéllar "
places.description: Transmission and recording unit for the UAAtv television channel (26.2 of free television). It began its transmissions on September 13, 2010.

places.name: Water treatment plant
places.description: Plant used for the treatment of water used to water the gardens of the university. The plant is designed to handle a flow of 11 l / s of water from three streams: first of the university, another part of the Fátima colony and finally of the Bosques division.

places.name: University Pool
places.description: Olympic Pool of the Universidad Autónoma de Aguascalientes, offers swimming courses to the community and the general public.

places.name: Promotion to the Second Language and CAADI
places.description: Self Learning Language Centers. Unit dedicated to the study of foreign languages, offers language courses to the university community and the general public. Here also the students carry out their activities to fulfill the plan of promotion to the second language.

places.name: Unit of Care and Research in Psychology
places.description: The Unit of Attention and Investigation has full-time professors to solve the academic demand, therapists, as well as with the participation of the students of the degree in Psychology. It puts within reach one more space to attend to the psychological aspect of the American population. Currently therapy services are offered to couples, family or individually, the latter differentiated between children, adolescents and adults.

places.name: University Services for Health Care
places.description: It offers the university community and the population in general that requires it, comprehensive health services with costs under the private environment.

places.name: University Hall of Multiple Uses
places.description: Space where diverse activities are realized like congresses, forums, meetings, etc.

places.name: Advanced Studies Unit
places.description: Unit dedicated to the development of science, technology and education at the graduate level through research.

places.name: "Dr. Ignacio T. Chávez" Auditorium
places.description: Auditorium inaugurated on January 1, 2000, has capacity for 180 people.

places.name: Multipurpose building "Dr. Luis Manuel Macías López"
places.description: The space of the Polyvalent building consists of 16 classrooms, four isoptic classrooms and a cabin.

places.name: University Liaison Unit
places.description: The following services are offered through the Liaison Department: Business Unit and Business Incubator, University Work Exchange, Concession Services and Attention to Social and Government Programs.

places.name: Didactic Unit of Design Management
places.description: Unit responsible for corporate management and design and institutional advertising.
